articles.author: Dominique Patton, David Stanway
articles.title: China’s Hubei province reports record surge in coronavirus deaths, more than 14,000 new cases - The Globe and Mail
articles.description: China’s Hubei province reports record surge in coronavirus deaths, more than 14,000 new cases The Globe and Mail
articles.content:
A resident wears a protective mask as he passes by empty shelves in the supermarket on February 12, 2020 in Wuhan, Hubei province, China.
wanghe/Getty Images
The death toll in Chinas Hubei province from a coronavirus outbreak leapt by a record 242 on Thursd… [+3150 chars]
